name: Frostallion Noct

aura.name: black_steed
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Changes the player's attack type to Dark and enhances Dark attacks while mounted.

description: Guardian deity of Palpagos Island known as the Night Caller. In the past, when a calamity struck the land, it soared into the sky and sealed away the threat by casting the island into eternal darkness.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: dark_ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: shadow_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: spirit_flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: crystal_wing
skills.description: Frostallion's exclusive skill. Dashes forward while creating frigid air around its wings, using them to slash enemies.

skills.name: nightmare_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: dark_laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
